issue.title: [C++] Use software __builtin_popcountll when building without SSE4.2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6663](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6663). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is to be extra safe in the context of ARROW-5381
